analyzed: 'du shes med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i 'bras bu ste /

original: 'du shes med pa'i sems can gyi khrod kyi lha rnams kyi nang du bskyed pa'i sems dang / sems las byung ba'i chos brtan pa ma yin pa rnams dang 'gog pa'o //
analyzed: 'du shes med pa'i sems can gyi khrod kyi lha rnams kyi nang du bskyed pa'i sems dang / sems las byung ba'i chos brtan pa ma yin pa rnams dang 'gog pa'o //
translated: It is the thought and the mental activities which are produced among the gods who are without ideation, and cessation due to deliberation.

original: srog gi dbang po gang zhe na /🔽ris mthun pa rnams su sngon gyi las kyis 'phangs pas /
analyzed: srog gi dbang po gang zhe na / ris mthun pa rnams su sngon gyi las kyis 'phangs pas /
translated: What is the faculty of life?🔽It is the duration of the aggregates projected by the action of a previous existence.

original: gang 'du byed rnams kyi gnas pa'i dus nges pa'o //
analyzed: gang 'du byed rnams kyi gnas pa'i dus nges pa'o //
translated: It is the duration of the aggregates projected by the action of a previous existence.

original: ris mthun pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: ris mthun pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is a class?

original: gang sems can rnams kyi lus 'dra ba'o //
analyzed: gang sems can rnams kyi lus 'dra ba'o //
translated: It is the similarity of the aggregates, elements and spheres of sentient beings.

original: skye ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: skye ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is birth?

original: ris mthun par 'du byed rnams ma byung ba las byung ba gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: ris mthun par 'du byed rnams ma byung ba las byung ba gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is the appearance of the aggregates projected by action.

original: rga ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: rga ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is aging?

original: de ltar de dag gi rgyun gzhan du 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: de ltar de dag gi rgyun gzhan du 'gyur ba'o //
translated: It is the modification of the aggregates projected by action.

original: gnas pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: gnas pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is duration?

original: de ltar de dag gi rgyun rgyud chags pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar de dag gi rgyun rgyud chags pa'o //
translated: It is the continuity of the aggregates projected by action.

original: mi rtag pa nyid gang zhe na /
analyzed: mi rtag pa nyid gang zhe na /
translated: What is impermanence?

original: de ltar de dag gi rgyun chad pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar de dag gi rgyun chad pa'o //
translated: It is the destruction of the continuity of the aggregates projected by action.

original: ming gi tshogs gang zhe na /
analyzed: ming gi tshogs gang zhe na /
translated: What is the collection of names?

original: chos rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyi tshig bla dags so //
analyzed: chos rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyi tshig bla dags so //
translated: It is the designation of the nature of the dharmas.

original: tshig gi tshogs gang zhe na /
analyzed: tshig gi tshogs gang zhe na /
translated: What is the collection of words?

original: chos rnams kyi khyad par gyi tshig bla dags so //
analyzed: chos rnams kyi khyad par gyi tshig bla dags so //
translated: It is the designation of the particularities of the dharmas.

original: yi ge'i tshogs gang zhe na /
analyzed: yi ge'i tshogs gang zhe na /
translated: What is the collection of syllables?

original: yi ge'i rnams te /
analyzed: yi ge'i rnams te /
translated: It is the syllables.

original: de gnyis ka gsal bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de gnyis ka gsal bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is the support of both the collection of words and the collection of phrases.

original: brjod pa yang de dag yin te /
analyzed: brjod pa yang de dag yin te /
translated: It is also speech,

original: ming dang tshig la brten nas don brjod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ming dang tshig la brten nas don brjod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is by means of speech that one expresses the meaning by means of the collection of words and the collection of phrases.🔽It is also syllables,

original: yi ge yang rnam grangs gzhan du mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yi ge yang rnam grangs gzhan du mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because they do not change their position.

original: so so'i skye bo nyid gang @15b zhe na /
analyzed: so so'i skye bo nyid gang @15b zhe na /
translated: What is the nature of an ordinary man?

original: 'phags pa'i chos rnams ma thob pa'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i chos rnams ma thob pa'o //
translated: It is the non-acquisition of the dharmas of the Āryans.

original: 'di ni 'du byed kyi phung po zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni 'du byed kyi phung po zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called the aggregate of formations.

original: rnam par shes pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is consciousness?

original: dmigs pa rnam par rig pa'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa rnam par rig pa'o //
translated: It is the perception of the object.

original: sems dang yid kyang de yin te //
analyzed: sems dang yid kyang de yin te //
translated: It is also mind and mentation.

original: sna tshogs pa dang yid rten byed pa'i phyir ro /
analyzed: sna tshogs pa dang yid rten byed pa'i phyir ro /
translated: It is also the various forms of consciousness.

original: dngos su na sems ni kun gzhi rnam par shes pa ste /
analyzed: dngos su na sems ni kun gzhi rnam par shes pa ste /
translated: In reality, mind is the store-consciousness.

original: 'di ltar de ni 'du byed thams cad kyi sa bon bsags pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar de ni 'du byed thams cad kyi sa bon bsags pa'o //
translated: Thus, it is the accumulation of the seeds of all conditioned things.

original: de yang dmigs pa dang rnam pa yongs su ma chad pa'o //
analyzed: de yang dmigs pa dang rnam pa yongs su ma chad pa'o //
translated: Moreover, it is not a limited object or mode of activity.

original: rigs gcig pa dang / rgyun chags par 'jug pa'o //🔽'di ltar 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / 'du shes med pa'i snyoms bar 'jug pa dang / pa rnams langs nas yang yul rnam par rig pa zhes bya ba 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba dang / dmigs pa'i rkyen la ltos nas rnam pa gzhan du 'jug pa nyid dang /
analyzed: rigs gcig pa dang / rgyun chags par 'jug pa'o // 'di ltar 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / 'du shes med pa'i snyoms bar 'jug pa dang / pa rnams langs nas yang yul rnam par rig pa zhes bya ba 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba dang / dmigs pa'i rkyen la ltos nas rnam pa gzhan du 'jug pa nyid dang /
translated: It is a single class and it functions in a continuous series.🔽Thus, when one arises from the meditative attainment of cessation or the meditative attainment of non-perception, the consciousness that is the foundation of the other evolving consciousnesses arises again.

original: chad nas yang 'byung ba nyid dang / 'khor bar 'jug pa dang / ldog pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chad nas yang 'byung ba nyid dang / 'khor bar 'jug pa dang / ldog pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is because of this that one enters and turns away from cyclic existence, since one enters cyclic existence and turns away from it due to the arising of the other evolving consciousnesses in a different mode of activity in dependence on the objective condition.

original: kun gzhi rnam par shes pa de nyid ni sa bon thams cad kyi gzhi nyid dang / lus kyi kun gzhi dang / rgyu nyid dang / lus la gnas pa nyid kyi yang phyir ro //
analyzed: kun gzhi rnam par shes pa de nyid ni sa bon thams cad kyi gzhi nyid dang / lus kyi kun gzhi dang / rgyu nyid dang / lus la gnas pa nyid kyi yang phyir ro //
translated: It is also because this consciousness is the foundation of all the seeds, the foundation of the body, the cause, and that which is based on the body.

original: len pa'i rnam par shes pa yang de yin te /
analyzed: len pa'i rnam par shes pa yang de yin te /
translated: It is also the appropriating consciousness.

original: lus len pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lus len pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it takes up a body.

original: dngos su ni yid ni kun gzhi rnam par shes pa la dmigs te /
analyzed: dngos su ni yid ni kun gzhi rnam par shes pa la dmigs te /
translated: In fact, the manas has the store-consciousness as its object.

original: rtag tu bdag tu rmongs pa dang // bdag tu lta ba dang / bdag tu nga rgyal dang / bdag la chags pa la sogs pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i rnam par shes pa ste /
analyzed: rtag tu bdag tu rmongs pa dang // bdag tu lta ba dang / bdag tu nga rgyal dang / bdag la chags pa la sogs pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i rnam par shes pa ste /
translated: It is always associated with four afflictions: the view of self, self-delusion, self-pride, and self-love.

original: rigs gcig pa dang / rgyun chags par 'jug pa ste /
analyzed: rigs gcig pa dang / rgyun chags par 'jug pa ste /
translated: It is of one type, and it evolves in a continuous series.

original: dgra bcom pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam dang / 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dus ma gtogs so /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam dang / 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dus ma gtogs so /
translated: It is interrupted in the state of the arhat, in the path of the noble ones, and in the attainment of cessation.

original: ci'i phyir phung po zhes bya zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir phung po zhes bya zhe na /
translated: Why is it called a heap?

original: spungs pa'i phyir te dus dang rgyud dang rnam pa dang grol ba dang / yul tha dad pa'i gzugs la sogs pa mdor bsdus pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: spungs pa'i phyir te dus dang rgyud dang rnam pa dang grol ba dang / yul tha dad pa'i gzugs la sogs pa mdor bsdus pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because it is a heap. Form and the rest are called heaps because they are collections of similar and dissimilar things, in terms of time, life-stream, type, freedom, and object.

original: skye mched bcu gnyis ni mig gi skye mched dang / gzugs kyi skye mched dang / rna ba'i skya mched dang / sgra'i skye mched dang / sna'i skye mched dang / dri'i skye mched dang / lce'i skye mched dang / ro'i skye @16a * //
analyzed: skye mched bcu gnyis ni mig gi skye mched dang / gzugs kyi skye mched dang / rna ba'i skya mched dang / sgra'i skye mched dang / sna'i skye mched dang / dri'i skye mched dang / lce'i skye mched dang / ro'i skye @16a * //
translated: The twelve sense bases are the eye sense base, the form sense base, the ear sense base, the sound sense base, the nose sense base, the smell sense base, the tongue sense base, the taste sense base, the body sense base, the tangible object sense base, the mental sense base, and the entity sense base.🔽

original: mched dang / lus kyi skye mched dang / reg bya'i skye mched dang / yid kyi skye mched dang / chos kyi skye mched do //
analyzed: mched dang / lus kyi skye mched dang / reg bya'i skye mched dang / yid kyi skye mched dang / chos kyi skye mched do //
translated: The twelve sense bases are the eye sense base, the form sense base, the ear sense base, the sound sense base, the nose sense base, the smell sense base, the tongue sense base, the taste sense base, the body sense base, the tangible sense base, the mind sense base, and the entity sense base.

original: mig la sogs ba dang / gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro'i skye mched la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin du bshad do //
analyzed: mig la sogs ba dang / gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro'i skye mched la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin du bshad do //
translated: The eye sense base, etc., and the form, sound, smell, and taste sense bases are as already explained.

original: reg bya'i skye mched ni 'byung ba chen po bzhi dag dang / gang reg bya'i phyogs gcig bshad pa'o //
analyzed: reg bya'i skye mched ni 'byung ba chen po bzhi dag dang / gang reg bya'i phyogs gcig bshad pa'o //
translated: The tangible sense base is the four great elements and that part of the form sense base which is tangible.

original: yid kyi skye mched ni rnam par shes pa'i phung po gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: yid kyi skye mched ni rnam par shes pa'i phung po gang yin pa'o //
translated: The mind sense base is the consciousness aggregate.

original: chos kyi skye mched ni gang tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par rig byed ma yin pa dang / 'dus ma byas so //
analyzed: chos kyi skye mched ni gang tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par rig byed ma yin pa dang / 'dus ma byas so //
translated: The element of mental objects is that which is not perceived by the eye, etc. It is feeling, perception, the formative forces, the unmanifest, and the unconditioned.

original: 'dus ma byas gang zhe na /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas gang zhe na /
translated: What is the unconditioned?

original: nam mkha' dang / so sor brtags pa ma yin pa'i 'gog pa dang / so sor brtags pa'i 'gog pa dang / de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: nam mkha' dang / so sor brtags pa ma yin pa'i 'gog pa dang / so sor brtags pa'i 'gog pa dang / de bzhin nyid do //
translated: It is space, the cessation due to deliberation, the cessation not due to deliberation, and Suchness.

original: de la nam mkha' gang zhe na /🔽gzugs kyi go 'byed pa'o //
analyzed: de la nam mkha' gang zhe na / gzugs kyi go 'byed pa'o //
translated: What is space?🔽It is the absence of any obstacle.

original: so sor brtags pa ma yin pa'i 'gog pa gang zhe na /🔽gang 'gog pa la bral ba ma yin pa ste /
analyzed: so sor brtags pa ma yin pa'i 'gog pa gang zhe na / gang 'gog pa la bral ba ma yin pa ste /
translated: What is the cessation due to deliberation?🔽It is the cessation of that which is to be experienced by being critically examined.

original: de ni nyon mongs pa'i gnyen po med par phung po rnams gtan du mi skye ba'o //
analyzed: de ni nyon mongs pa'i gnyen po med par phung po rnams gtan du mi skye ba'o //
translated: It is the absolute non-arising of the aggregates due to the absence of the conditions of origination and to the continuity of the absence of the defilements.

original: so sor brtags pa'i 'gog pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: so sor brtags pa'i 'gog pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the cessation not due to deliberation?

original: gang 'gog pa de ni bral ba ste /
analyzed: gang 'gog pa de ni bral ba ste /
translated: It is the cessation of that which is to be experienced by not being critically examined.

original: de ni gang nyon mongs pa'i gnyen pos phung po rnams gtan du mi skye ba'o /
analyzed: de ni gang nyon mongs pa'i gnyen pos phung po rnams gtan du mi skye ba'o /
translated: It is the absolute non-arising of the aggregates due to the absence of the conditions of origination and to the absence of critical examination.

original: de bzhin nyid gang zhe na /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid gang zhe na /
translated: What is Suchness?

original: gang chos rnams kyi chos nyid dang / chos bdag med pa nyid do //
analyzed: gang chos rnams kyi chos nyid dang / chos bdag med pa nyid do //
translated: The reality of phenomena and the selflessness of phenomena.

original: ci'i phyir skye mched ces bya zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir skye mched ces bya zhe na /
translated: Why are they called sense bases?

original: rnam par shes pa skye ba'i sgo'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa skye ba'i sgo'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they are the doors for the arising of consciousness.🔽The eighteen constituents are the eye constituent, form constituent, eye-consciousness constituent, ear constituent, sound constituent,

original: khams bco brgyad ni mig gi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / rna ba'i khams dang / sgra'i khams dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / sna'i khams dang / dri'i khams dang /
analyzed: khams bco brgyad ni mig gi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / rna ba'i khams dang / sgra'i khams dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / sna'i khams dang / dri'i khams dang /
translated: ear-consciousness constituent, nose constituent, smell constituent,🔽nose-consciousness constituent, tongue constituent, taste constituent,🔽tongue-consciousness constituent, body constituent, tangible-object constituent,

original: sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lce'i khams dang / ro'i khams dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lus kyi khams dang / reg bya'i khams dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / yid kyi khams dang / chos kyi khams dang /
analyzed: sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lce'i khams dang / ro'i khams dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lus kyi khams dang / reg bya'i khams dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / yid kyi khams dang / chos kyi khams dang /
translated: body-consciousness constituent, mental constituent, phenomenon constituent,

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams so //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams so //
translated: and mental-consciousness constituent.

original: mig la sogs @16b pa'i khams dang / gzugs la sogs pa'i khams ni skye mched rnams ji lta ba bzhin no //
analyzed: mig la sogs @16b pa'i khams dang / gzugs la sogs pa'i khams ni skye mched rnams ji lta ba bzhin no //
translated: The eye element, etc., and the form element, etc., are the same as the sense bases.

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams drug po dag ni mig la sogs pa rnams la brten te /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams drug po dag ni mig la sogs pa rnams la brten te /
translated: The six elements of consciousness are the consciousnesses that arise in dependence on the eye, etc.,

original: gzugs la sogs pa la dmigs pa rnam par rig pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa la dmigs pa rnam par rig pa'o //
translated: and have form, etc., as their objects.

original: yid kyi khams ni de dag nyid 'gags ma thag pa ste /
analyzed: yid kyi khams ni de dag nyid 'gags ma thag pa ste /
translated: The mind element is the immediately past six consciousnesses,

original: rnam par shes pa drug pa'i gnas brtan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa drug pa'i gnas brtan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they are the support for the arising of the six consciousnesses.

original: de ltar na khams bco brgyad du rnam par gzhag go //
analyzed: de ltar na khams bco brgyad du rnam par gzhag go //
translated: Thus the eighteen elements are established.

original: gzugs kyi phung po gang yin ba de ni skye mched dang / khams bcu dang / chos kyi skye mched dang / khams kyi phyogs gcig go //
analyzed: gzugs kyi phung po gang yin ba de ni skye mched dang / khams bcu dang / chos kyi skye mched dang / khams kyi phyogs gcig go //
translated: The form aggregate is ten sense bases and elements, and it is one part of the sense base and element of mental objects.

original: rnam par shes pa'i phung po gang yin pa de ni yid kyi skye mched dang / sems kyi khams bdun no //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i phung po gang yin pa de ni yid kyi skye mched dang / sems kyi khams bdun no //
translated: The consciousness aggregate is the mind sense base and the seven elements of consciousness.

original: gzhan phung po gsum po gang yin pa dag dang / gzugs kyi phung po'i phyogs gcig po de dang / 'dus ma byas dang bcas pa ni chos kyi skye mched dang / chos kyi khams so //
analyzed: gzhan phung po gsum po gang yin pa dag dang / gzugs kyi phung po'i phyogs gcig po de dang / 'dus ma byas dang bcas pa ni chos kyi skye mched dang / chos kyi khams so //
translated: The other three aggregates, one part of the form aggregate, and the unconditioned factors constitute the sense sphere of factors and the element of factors.

original: ci'i phyir khams zhes bya zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir khams zhes bya zhe na /
translated: Why is it called element?

original: byed pa med la rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: byed pa med la rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is the receptacle of its own specific characteristics.

original: ci'i phyir phung po la sogs pa bshad ce na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir phung po la sogs pa bshad ce na /
translated: Why are the aggregates, etc. taught?

original: bdag tu 'dzin pa rnam pa gsum gyi gnyen po go rims bzhin no //
analyzed: bdag tu 'dzin pa rnam pa gsum gyi gnyen po go rims bzhin no //
translated: In order to remedy the three kinds of belief in a self.

original: bdag tu 'dzin pa rnam pa gsum ni gcig pur 'dzin pa dang / za bar 'dzin pa dang / byed par 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: bdag tu 'dzin pa rnam pa gsum ni gcig pur 'dzin pa dang / za bar 'dzin pa dang / byed par 'dzin pa'o //
translated: The three kinds of belief in a self are the belief in a self as a unity, the belief in a self as an experiencer, and the belief in a self as an agent.

original: khams bco brgyad la gzugs can du zhe na /
analyzed: khams bco brgyad la gzugs can du zhe na /
translated: How many of the eighteen elements are material?

original: gang dag gzugs kyi phung po'i ngo bo nyid do //
analyzed: gang dag gzugs kyi phung po'i ngo bo nyid do //
translated: Those that have the nature of the aggregate of form.

original: gzugs can ma yin pa du zhe na /
analyzed: gzugs can ma yin pa du zhe na /
translated: How many are not material?

original: lhag ma rnams so //
analyzed: lhag ma rnams so //
translated: The rest.

original: brten du yod pa du zhe na /🔽gzugs kyi khams gcig ste /
analyzed: brten du yod pa du zhe na / gzugs kyi khams gcig ste /
translated: How many are visible?🔽One element is visible.

original: yul bstan du yod pa'o //
analyzed: yul bstan du yod pa'o //
translated: The element of form.🔽How many are not visible?

original: bstan du med pa ni du zhe na /
analyzed: bstan du med pa ni du zhe na /
translated: How many are not visible?

original: lhag ma rnams so //
analyzed: lhag ma rnams so //
translated: The rest.

original: thogs pa dang bcas pa du zhe na /
analyzed: thogs pa dang bcas pa du zhe na /
translated: How many are resistant?

original: gzugs can bcu ste /
analyzed: gzugs can bcu ste /
translated: The ten that are form.

original: gang la gang thogs pa'o //
analyzed: gang la gang thogs pa'o //
translated: They are resistant to each other.

original: thogs pa med pa du zhe na /
analyzed: thogs pa med pa du zhe na /
translated: How many are non-resistant?

original: lhag ma rnams so /
analyzed: lhag ma rnams so /
translated: The rest.

original: zag pa dang bcas pa du zhe na /
analyzed: zag pa dang bcas pa du zhe na /
translated: How many are impure?

original: bco lnga dang tha ma gsum gyi cha'o //
analyzed: bco lnga dang tha ma gsum gyi cha'o //
translated: Fifteen and part of the last three.

original: de dag nyon mongs pa skye ba'i mngon sum gyi spyod yul gyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag nyon mongs pa skye ba'i mngon sum gyi spyod yul gyi phyir ro //
translated: Because they are the domain of direct perception of the arising of the afflictions.

original: zag pa med pa du zhe na /
analyzed: zag pa med pa du zhe na /
translated: How many are pure?

original: tha ma gsum gyi cha'o //
analyzed: tha ma gsum gyi cha'o //
translated: Part of the last three.

original: 'dod pa dang rab tu ldan pa du zhe na /
analyzed: 'dod pa dang rab tu ldan pa du zhe na /
translated: How many are associated with desire?

original: thams cad do //
analyzed: thams cad do //
translated: All.

original: gzugs dang rab tu ldan pa du zhe na /
analyzed: gzugs dang rab tu ldan pa du zhe na /
translated: How many are associated with form?

original: @17a * // bcu bzhi ste /
analyzed: @17a * // bcu bzhi ste /
translated: Fourteen,

original: dri dang / ro dang / sna dang / lce'i rnam par shes ba ma gtogs pa'o //
